body.name: Handheld Steam Cleaner, Steamer for Cleaning, 10 in 1 Handheld Steamer for Cleaning, Upholstery Steamer Cleaner, Car Steamer, Steam Cleaner for Surface Cleaning Home, Sofa, Bathroom, Car seat, Office (Green)

Or fastest pickup Thursday, February 15. Order within 21 hrs 26 mins
features: 【450ml Capacity Water Tank】This handheld steamer for cleaning features an extra large water tank of 450ml capacity(The recommended load capacity is within 250ml so as to leave a certain space to ensure normal use). This large steam cleaner allows you to focus on cleaning, instead of refilling often. Lightweight, portable, and with a long power cord(16.4ft), this handheld carpet cleaner can go further and work distantly.

【CONSTANT Steam Pressure】Add 250ml water, floor steamer can continuously steam out for about 8 minutes WITHOUT INTERVALS, unlike other car carpet cleaner that has to stop to build the pressure after every 1 or 2 minutes’ spraying(Some rug cleaner may just work for 20 seconds at a time and so you have to wait and wait for it to heat up).Our upgraded pet carpet cleaner does save your time and boost your efficiency.

【Powerfully Clean the Toughest】Kiato handheld steam cleaner, working over 1050-1150 watts, can emit 105℃(221℉)high pressured flow of steam that is excessively powerful to deeply clean and make things in your home “new” again with no effort. Aim this upholstery cleaner at stain,grime, even the hard gooey spots that regular cleaning cannot dissolve, it melts right off, the only thing you need to do is to gently wipe up the leftover and then done!

【10-piece Accessory Set】This steamer does an amazing job of cleaning and ironing. Plus 10-piece accessory kit such as: angled nozzle, bendable extension, nozzle with brush, fabric steamer tool, rubber wiper for window/door, and many other extras. It’s all-purpose and can go and clean out any hard to reach gaps, corners, angles, and also various surfaces/materials: kitchen sink, countertop, BBQ grill, toilet, floor, kids’ toy, pet mattress, car, sofa, and clothing.

【Chemical-free and Healthy】This portable carpet steamer cleans by hot pressured steam to remove dirt and grease. No chemical residue on your utensils, pet mattresses, kids’ toys.Stop using the harsh chemicals dear, never take chances with your family’s health anymore, try this couch cleaner, you will surely appreciate such a helpful and safe cleaning wizard and definitely go crazy with it.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Kiato Handheld Steam Cleaner, 10 in 1 Set Steamer for Household Cleaning, Multi-purpose for multi-surface/multi-material Kiato steam cleaners ,10-Piece Accessory Set, 8min Continuous Spraying W/O Intervals, 450ml Tank(250ml Maxi Load), 105℃(221℉) High Pressured Steam Brief Description: Kiato Handheld Steam Cleaner is a good helper for your household cleaning, car cleaning, kitchen utensil/bedroom/kids’ toys/gooey grills/pets’ mattresses/floor cleaning, without any chemicals required, making the cleaning/ironing more hygienic, thorough and safe! How to use? Unscrew the safety cap counterclockwise and take it down;Add no more than 250ml water with the measuring cup and funnel;Close the safety cap back on;Choose and put on the most suitable accessories for different materials, surfaces, angles, gaps and corners.Plug in the power cord, the power LED light at the bottom will turn on indicating that the steamer is heating up(The heating time is about 2 minutes and 30 seconds ); When the light goes off, it means heating finished and it’s ready for use.When light off, press down the steam button, and do the cleaning. (Dear, please keep the steam cleaner connected to power supplies during use) Tips About Adding Water: Before adding water, please unplug the power cord first, wait for about 3-5minutes to let it cool down until the red spot in the middle of the safety cap(lid) sinks down, then you can open it(Tips: Discharging the residual steam after use by long holding the steam button will speed up the cooling process).Then screw off the safety cap(Open the safety cap only in case that power is cut down and steam inside cools down to avoid scald).Add no more than 250ml of water.Please do not directly contact the steam, it’ high temp and hot.

450ml Large Reservoir(Maxi Load: 250ml) If you do want a helpful steam cleaner, go get one with a bigger tank. This carpet steam cleaner features a 450ml large reservoir(recommended to load 250ml), you don’t have to refill often to get through each job. 8mins Continuous Spraying W/O Intervals Kiato portable steamer allows you to continuously clean for about 8mins without intervals, different from most other car seat cleaner that will stop to reheat after every 1 or 2 minutes’ steaming out. 105℃（221℉）High Temp Cleaning Working over 1050-1150 watts, this hand steamer can emit 105℃（221℉）high pressured flow of steam blast that is excessively powerful to deeply clean out the hard, sticky or gooey grease/grime easily and thoroughly. 5M/16.4ft Long Power Cord Lightweight, portable, and with an extra long power cord(5m/16.4ft), this mattress cleaner can go further and work distantly around the room. The user-oriented furniture cleaner will serve you at your comfort in every cleaning project.

Windows And Glass This floor cleaner machine easily and effortlessly cleans out windows, doors, tilts, stainless steel surface, floor, etc. And can also serve as a steamer for car detailing, which will save you a ton more on car wash. Kitchen(Chemical-free) This handheld steam cleaner is absolutely incredible at removing the gooey grease on kitchen sink, countertop, stove, utensil, cookware, cupboard, or BBQ grills, while leaves no any chemical residue behind. Clean Toilet The carpet steamer can powerfully and deeply clean around the base of the toilet, the edge of the toilet bowl, and many other hard-to-reach areas on window sill, sliding doors and more that are difficult to clean. Clean Carpet & Iron Clothes This 10-piece accessory set comes with many attachments including the fabric steamer attachment. Use the fabric steamer tool to clean sofa, bed, carpet, car seat, as well as smooth the folds on everyday clothes/fabric surfaces.

Specification: Power Supply: AC 110-120V, 50/60HzRated Power: 1050W - 1150WWater Tank Capacity: 450ml(250ml water allowed)Steam Pressure: 2.5-3.0barInjected Steam Capacity: 28g/minSteam Temperature: 105℃（221℉）Over Dimension: 9.84 x 5.03 x 7.48 inLength of Power Cord: about 16.4ft/5m Kindly Reminder: Due to the high temperature and pressure inside the water tank, it is forbidden to add detergent. For quick cleaning, spray the detergent on the stain to soften it.Capacity of water tank is 450ml, but in order to get best experience, we suggest that ADD no more than 250ml WATER AT A TIME, so as to leave a certain space to ensure normal use.After cleaning, leave the steam upholstery cleaner machine for a period of time.After cooling, pour out the remaining water.Input voltage of this commercial carpet cleaning machine is 110-120V〜50/60Hz, and it needs an outlet to work while using. It can continuously work for about 8minutes without intervals.Do not tilt the steamer more than 45 degrees during use to avoid overflow.
Fast & Effective Steam Cleaning Tips: 1. Aim the steam cleaner at the stains as close as possible. 2. Spray first to melt off the stains, and then brush them off with great ease.

Kiato Steamer - Limitless Use Time Kiato Steamer - Limitless Use Time Kiato Steamer - Limitless Use Time Kiato Handheld Steamer Kiato Handheld Steamer Kiato Handheld Steamer Capacity 400ml 270ml 400ml 450ml 450ml 450ml Maxi Load 400ml 270ml 400ml 250ml 250ml 250ml Accessories Quantity 10pcs 8pcs 10pcs 10pcs 10pcs 10pcs Hands Free Steam ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works wonderful. I've been able to steam clean my whole house
reviews.reviewText: It's great for couches and working in tight spaces. I love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Grease be gone.
reviews.reviewText: I had a great amount of grease buildup on my refrigerator. I didn’t want to use chemicals and this steamer just got me so happy to start getting out the trenches of depression. I placed the nozzle close so the heat was able to melt the buildup and all I did was wipe clean. No scrubbing at all.It also steams clothing, which is great because the materials I have in my wardrobe are better without an iron.Heats up super fast.Someone gave a tip unplug and to press the button to release the steam so it can be opened faster than waiting for it to cool down. thanks 😉 I did exactly that. Haven’t used all the attachments yet, but I’m impressed. I did steam a niqab I was intending on wear and it was great to just hang and steam.The nozzle does need to be supported because it is like a ball and joint it moves. * It was me and not locking it in place. It’s lightweight and very easy to use. I actually locked it in place by mistake, but now, I’m totally happier than a little now. Make sure to empty the device and let air dry to prolong the life of the steamer. I used just tap water. Vinagre is acidic so I’m not adding that to my device.Improvement suggestions:Create a window to see if water is out and an indicator light to show when to fill more water.I over filled on purpose and steam and blobs of water were the result of that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was very pleasantly surprised by this item! Works great! Only thing is that it really needs a longer hose and a button you could lock into continuous steam would be great! I would definitely purchase again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this steam cleaner. It is exactly as advertised, easy to use and hit spots that I have not been able to address. I sprayed a disinfectant on the area I needed to clean and hit it with the Kiato Steamer. It made the job so much easier. I bragged about it to friends and encouraged them to order one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I normally don’t write product reviews
reviews.reviewText: I bought this in the hopes to clean and disinfect my house in a less toxic way. Used this product 4 times in total. Each use had the strongest smell of plastic coming out with the steam that only intensified the more times I used it. I definitely holds a lot of water and you can get a good amount of steam out of just one use only down side is that on the 4th use it started to steam from all ends and reeked of toxic chemical plastics. It was plugged in and in use for a min and I couldn’t believe that it had already broke down after the first few uses. Spend a little extra more and get yourself a higher end one because this one won’t last you long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great buy!
reviews.reviewText: Kiato Steam Cleaner ReviewI received my Kiato steam cleaner last week—but with some major remodeling coming up beginning Monday—I just got the chance to use it.Here’s what I found:1. Unlike most steam cleaners, this one has 8 full minutes of steam cleaning before you have to refill it and wait. It doesn’t take much. I even poured out some water after I was done.2. It comes with oodles of attachments for windows, car interiors, clothes, etc.3. It has a very long cord. 12 feet. Also it’s lightweight. About 4.5 lbs.4. It shoots out bursts of steam at a high speed but it’s not overly watery.5. It worked amazing and easily on my window sills and corners. Blew the dirt right out while cleaning it. I used it on my fridge grate at the bottom—really cleaned it. I used it on the tile at the base of the dishwasher. Cleaned it right up. I used it around the base of the bottom over door. Did very well. Cleaned around the faucets. Did well there also. I got those ugly bolts that hold your car seats in completely clean. Used one of their small brushes.What it didn’t do:1. I tried—for the heck of it—to see if it would remove grease from a stoneware piece I had. It doesn’t. Doesn’t remove grease very quickly from the oven either. I had a few spots and found a degreaser wipe was better.Was it with it? Yes and yes! I’ll use it in my new bathroom on the shower doors too. Worked amazing on the toilet without having to use chemicals since I have a toilet drinker in the house!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchase 20 of these a year for our techs and this one has been amazing! Will buy these from now on.

reviews.reviewTitle: Adapter burnt out on first trial
reviews.reviewText: I received the product and took sometime to use it. On the first trial itself the adapter burnt out. I’m a there any possibility for replacement. Tried few more adapters but all are getting burnt down. The mechanic says the machine is faulty. We request you to kindly exchange the oroduct
